actions.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment repeals a provision in current law that allows certain illegal aliens to apply for permanent status and remain in the United States while their applications are being adjudicated.
purpose: An amendment to repeal a provision in current law allowing certain illegal aliens to apply for permanent status and remain in the United States while their applications are being adjudicated.
